org.apache.juneau.rest

Interface RestCallLogger

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RestCallLogger.Null
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicRestCallLogger

    public interface RestCallLogger
    Interface class used for logging HTTP requests to the log file.
    • RestContext.REST_callLogger
    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > Logging / Debugging

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RestCallLogger.Null
      Represents no RestLogger.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void log(RestCallLoggerConfig config, HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse res)
      Called at the end of a servlet request to log the request.

    • Method Detail

      • log

        void log(RestCallLoggerConfig config,
         HttpServletRequest req,
         HttpServletResponse res)
        Called at the end of a servlet request to log the request.
        Parameters:
        config - The logging configuration.
        req - The servlet request.
        res - The servlet response.
